description:
Ail and http://anidb.net/ch7788 [An] are two new enemies that appeared after Usagi and her friends are reborn on Earth after defeating the Dark Kingdom.
They had wandered around space alone for many years before reaching Earth, where they finally find energy to collect for the http://anidb.net/ch7793 [Makaiju] (Hell Tree) so that they can revive it and give them energy to survive. To do this, they drain the life energy of humans by using monster named Cardians.
Source: wiki
name: Ail
